user.description: The user you want to get the account of

account.targetEconomyNotInitialized: This person has not started playing yet. He/She has to run `/economyconfig user start`

daily.notUnlocked: You have not researched the daily souls yet! `/research`

economyconfig.description: Economy Configuration for users and admins

user.description: Configuration for your economy in this guild.

delete.description: DELETE all your economy data! This is irreversible!

confirmation.description: Write "CLEAR ALL" to confirm deleting your economy data.

admin.description: Configure the economy in this guild

toggle.description: Enables/Disables the economy for this guild.

clear.description: DELETES ALL ECONOMY DATA (including config). This is irreversible!

confirmation.description: Write "CLEAR ALL" to confirm deleting the guild's economy data.

blacklist.description: Allow or disallow something or someone for all gaining methods.

channel.description: Allow or disallow a channel from all gaining methods (eg. chat messages in a spam channel).

role.description: Allow or disallow a role from all gaining methods (eg. chat messages in all channels).

user.description: Allow or disallow an user from all gaining methods (eg. chat messages in all channels).

get.description: Get all settings and their values.

min_message_length.description: The minimum message length required to get souls.

max_message_length.description: The maximum message length required to get souls.

start.alreadyInitiated: You have run this command already! You can use the economy.
start.success: You can now use the economy. Try out `/account`, `/stats` and `/research`!

delete.needConfirm: You need to confirm this action by writing `CLEAR ALL` in the confirm option!
delete.success: All your economy data (including config) for this guild has been deleted. Start using the economy with `/economyconfig user start`.

admin.noPerm: You don't have the permission to run admin commands!

clear.needConfirm: You need to confirm this action by writing `CLEAR ALL` in the confirm option!
clear.success: All economy data (including config) for this guild has been deleted and the economy has been disabled.

blacklist.listEmbedDescription: This guild is currently blacklisting the following objects from gaining souls:
blacklist.setFooterText: Run this command without arguments to get the whole blacklist.

gainingRules.getEmbedDescription: This are the first 25 entries of the guild's economy config.

target.description: The user you want to give souls.

amount.description: The amount of souls you want to give. (% is supported)

error.bot: You want to give your souls to a bot?
error.noAmount: You need to specify how many souls you want to give!
error.noMoney: You are too poor to give someone souls...
error.targetEconomyNotInitialized: The person you want to give souls to has not started playing yet. He/She has to run `/economyconfig user start`

give.embedDescription:
You gave {amount} Souls to <@{target}>! <:soul:1011962640349810688>
>>> Your souls: {newUserAmount} <:soul:1011962640349810688>
His/Her souls: {newTargetAmount} <:soul:1011962640349810688>

research.description: Upgrade your skills and research new ones!

currency_bonus_percentage.name: Soul Bonus (%)
currency_bonus_percentage.description: How many more Souls (in percent) you're getting for your activities.

currency_bonus_absolute.name: Soul Bonus
currency_bonus_absolute.description: How many more Souls you're getting for your activities.

research_speed_percentage.name: Research Speed (%)
research_speed_percentage.description: How much faster (in percent) you're able to research.

research_bonus_percentage.name: Research Efficiency (%)
research_bonus_percentage.description: How big the bonuses are wich you're getting by researching.

power.name: Power
power.description: One of your most important stats. It protects you from other players in several ways and lets you handle more powerful slaves.

defense.name: Defense
defense.description: Protects you from other players in several ways.

currency_capacity.name: Soul Capacity
currency_capacity.description: How many souls you can have at once. If you are 50% over your limit, you will lose 75% of your souls!

slave_capacity.name: Slave Capacity
slave_capacity.description: How many slaves you can have at once.

research.selectMenuPlaceholder: What do you want to research?
research.notEnoughMoney: You have not enough souls to research this upgrade!
research.onCooldown: You are currently researching this one! It will finish in <t:{time}:R>.
research.maxLevel: You have already maxed out this skill!
research.onMaxConcurrentResearches: You cannot research even more skills at once!
research.success:
The upgrade for **{skill}** {emoji} to Level `{lvl}` has started!
It will finish <t:{time}:R> (<t:{time}>)

stats.description: Get more in-depth stats about a user or yourself

target.description: The user you want to get stats about

stats.noStats: This user is powerless and has no stats which are worth displaying.

top.description: Displays the most powerful people of this guild.
top.embedDescription: These are the top 10 members, sorted by their power:
top.noneFound: No one here has any power!
